name: prop_url
description: This is the property URL where the apartment listing can be viewed online. It contains specific details about the property.

name: prop_address
description: This is the specific address of the property. It includes the street name and street number.

name: prop_floor
description: This indicates the floor on which the apartment is located.

name: prop_price
description: This is the listed price of the property in USD.

name: prop_m2
description: This is the size of the property in square meters.

name: prop_rooms
description: This is the number of rooms in the apartment.

name: prop_bedrooms
description: This is the number of bedrooms in the apartment.

name: prop_location
description: This is the location of the property, including the neighborhood and city.

name: prop_description
description: This is a detailed description of the property, providing information about its features and amenities. It may include information on the property's layout, available utilities, interior details, and other features such as a balcony or patio.

name: prop_images
description: This is a list of URLs for images of the property. These images provide a visual representation of the property, its rooms, and its features.

name: project_url
description: This is the URL where the real estate project can be viewed online. It contains specific details about the project.

name: project_district
description: This is the district in which the project is located.

name: project_address
description: This is the specific address of the real estate project. It includes the building name or number.

name: project_description
description: This is a detailed description of the real estate project, providing information about its features and amenities. It may include information on the state of the project, the number of bedrooms in the apartments, financing options, prices, and other relevant details.

name: project_images
description: This is a list of URLs for images of the real estate project. These images provide a visual representation of the project and its features.
